Utterance: Tai amra aj ekhane CBT ebong apnar abhijnohta somporkhe kotha bolte eshechi. CBT-te jawaar chinta somporke prathomikbhabe apnar anubhuti kemon chhilo?

Amar clinical psychologist amake bolche je amar kauke dekha dorkar. Ami bhebhechilam amar kauke dekhar dorkar nei karon amar sathe kichu bhul chhilo na. Amar sobematro hridrogo chhilo. Ebong ami, amar hridrogo eto gurutaro hoye giyechhilo ebong ami kebal klanto chhilam ebong emon keu chhilo na je etike aro bhalo korte pare. Amar kotha shune ba amar sathe kotha bole, ami bhebhechilam je amake niramoy korte pare ta holo heart surgery. Ebong jokhon tini paramorsh dichhilen je ami kauke dekhte pai, tokhon etir kono mane chhilo na. Kintu jehetu ami khub bishonno chhilam, eto dure chole giyechilam, ami, amar swami amar swamir madhyame, ami bhebhechilam ami chesta kori ebong shudhu ekta suyog ghrano kori ebong shudhu karo kotha shuni ba kauke amar kotha shunte dey, karon ami nishchit chhilam na je eti kii jorito. Ami age kono clinical psychologist-er kache jaini. Tai ekti clinical psychologist hishabe amar kache ekti sankochon chhilo, apnar mostishker moddhe oboshshoi guruttor kichhu bhul chhilo ja apnake ekti clinical psychologist-er sathe dekha korte hobe ebong amar kauke dekhar dorkar nei. Kintu Mita o jokhon korechhilo tokhon bujhlam heart surgeryr jonno opokkho korte mone porena. Ami talikay amar nam rakhechi. Opokkho korar jonno amar grahonyogyo kauke sahayyo kora uchit, karon ami opokkho korte chai na ebong se amar kotha shunle naki amar mone onubhob korbe ebong ki amake tahole shohayyo korte pare ebong ki amake banateche ami jevabe bhabchi shevabe feel kori. Ebong mojar bapar holo, ekjon mohila hishabe, apni onubhob koren je apni onno karo kandhe kandte pare. Kintu prothombar, shudhu amar abeg tar kache prokash korechi. Tini amake kandte sahayyo korechen ebong ami tare dekhe, eti amake bhitore theke nijekete dekhte sahayyo koreche. Je gyan kore tole. Ami tokhon bujhte shuru kori je keno amake heart surgery korate hobe ta noy karon ami klanto chhilam kintu amar poribar chhilo ebong amar sathe jara kosto nie rasta diye giyechilo tara sobai pagol chhilo tai amar eti kora dorkar chhilo. Ebong tarpor shesh porjonto ami amar nam talikay namichhi na jeneo eti eto todratodi kora hobe karon jigyasa kora hoyeche heart surgery korte amake six theke ato mash somoy lagbe. Kintu jokhon ami amar clinical psychology dekhte shuru kori, tokhon bujhlam, ami amar nam likhechhi ebong 30 diner moddhe amar opokkho korano hoyeche. Sutonoto eti apnar sathe clinical psychologistsder bhumikar ekta ongsher moto shonachhe ja apnake opokkho kora uchit kina ta nite apnar nirdeshon neite sahayyo kore. Haan. Kintu apni eto bolchen je apni tokhon besh bishonno chhilen je CBT apnar hatashar jonno o sahayok chhilo, eti sahayyo korechhilo karon tokhon, kanna kati korte pore ebong abeggatobhabe jinisgulike dhore rakhar poriborte, eti amake jinisgulike ber hote sahayyo korechhilo. Ebong jinisgulike ber kore daoar maddhome, eti amake bujhte sahayyo korechhilo je ami ki anubhav korchhilam karon beshi samoy amra jinisgulike botal kore rakhi, amra kabhu segulike ber korte dibo na ba amra kabhu amader moddhe naki ami jinishgulike bojhate chai na ebong ebong tokhon amader chokhe jol ashche ebong amar hridoy fulche karon ami jani na je onno keu eti korte pare na. Shudhu apnar kotha shunte, apni jano, jemon amra jokhon mayer kache jai jokhon apnar kono somossha hoy ebong apni mone koren je keu bujhte parbe na, kintu amar ma pare karon tini jano ami ki kore esechi. Kintu eta bolar opekshay rakhena je clinical psychologistsra etoi. Kintu eta thik jevabe tara apnar kotha shunbe. Shudhu emon akjon thakbe je apnar kotha shunte pare ebong seta theke thakte pare ebong apni nijekete prokash korte dite pare. Eibhabe ebong apni ki somossha peyechhen ta ber korte ebong jodi tara ber korte pare ta hole tader madhye sei somosshagulir samadhan korte sahayyo korte.
CBT shomporkhe kichhu ki chhilo, bishesh kore, ja apni khujhe peyechen apnar jonno sahayok chhilo?

Dr. Peni pothe'r protiti podokshep'e amar sathe chhilen. Amar je shomosto somossha chhilo, tini amake sahayo korechilen amake dekhan je sobkichu shomadhan korar ek-ti shohoj upay ache ebong sobkichur baire ek-ti boro somossha toiri kora jay na. Apnar jodi sahayyer hater proyojon hoy tobe protiti podokshepe emon kau thake je sahayyo korte thake. Ebong ebhabei ami tar sathe therapy shesh korar somoy ami janate peyechilam je clinical psychologistra kebal string noy. Tara amader moto manush ebong tara amader moto anubhav kore ebong eti onek sohoj. Karo sathe kotha bolar jonno jokhon apnar somossha hoy karon amra sobai shighro ba pore amader jibonkaler breakdown'e kori. Jodi apnake manoshikbhabhe osustho hote na hoy, apni ek-ti gari durghatnaye porte paren, bari'r je kon somossha emon kichu ja apnar poribare mrittu porjonto hote pare ja apni venge jete paren. Ebong apni kemon anubhav korchen ta shonar jonno apnar kauke darun, karon amra sobai mone kori je onyo keu sobabhabekhe jano ami ki anubhav korchi ba bhavchi. Kintu eta shevabe noy. Amader sobar alada ache.
CBT-e jet'e kono osuvindha achhe kina

Shurute, ami korini. CBT-er jonno amar kono truti chhilo na karon ami khuboi bishonno chhilam, amar eta dorkar chhilo. Ebong ami dekhte pelam je tara charpasher emon lok chhilo jara amake sahayo korbe tai kichui chhilo na. Ekmotro jinis ja amake thamiechhilo ta holo ami.
Mone hochhe eti amader jonno ekti bhalo obhijoyota chhilo. Apni jodi jante chan tahole emon kono poramorsho ja apni emon kauke dite chan jara ekhon CBT-er jonno jawaar kotha bhabe?

Haan. CBT shobder dik'e takaben na. Kintu pechoner loktar dik'e takan. Karon onek somoy amra boro boro shobd dekhi ebong sei shobdgulo'r arth amra bujhi na. Ebong amra anuman kori, kintu kono kono somoy amra jokhon clinical psychologistder moto shabd'er pichone takai, tokhon ami ek-ti shongkuchit boltau ebong ami kono somoy nijeke bhabtau na je tara manoshik lokder sathe mokabela kore. Tobe eto na je, apni bishonnotay bhugetechhen. Apni jekono dhorte parben ebong apnar proyojon hole clinical psychologist'er kache jawar kotha hok beshi bhalo. Karon eki, amader jibone shighro ba pore, amader ekjon ebong beshirbhaag lok'er proyojon hobe jokhon apni janen je apni jokhon olpo boshko lokder khujte paben je ajkal, prochur yubok jibone eto chap'er modhye jachchhe. Jodi apnar pita ba mata ba bondhu na thake ebong apni bishonnotay bhugetechhen, tobe tara-i sotyo boktider sathe kotha bolen karon apnar jibone emon kauke paoa bhalo jaar sathe apni kotha bolte paren. Karon ami jani amar poribare emon kau nei jara amake kotha bolte pari. Ami sob somoy mone kori amar shami amake kakhonoi bujhbe na. Amar bachchara amake kakhonoi bujhbe na. Ami jokhon doctor'er kache jai, tokhon tar kache amar jonno yathechchhota somoy thakbe na. Tobe ekti clinical psychologist'er sathe, tara apnar jonno sei somoy ta toiri kore. Ebong tara apnar kotha shone, apni tader sathe nijerke prokash korer jonno sei somoy peyechhen ebong apni ekhono anusorjon korechen, tara apnake porikha korte paren ebong sobkichu thik ache kina ta nishchit korte paren. Apni na hole sobkichu thik hobe na. Tadera sob somoy apnake sahayo korte pare ebong upaygulo porikha korte ebong khujte pete pare. Apni sahayo korte pare emon onno lokeder sathe jogajog koren ba eki somoye thakar onno lokeder sathe jogajog koren. Apni ebong apni ek-ti sukhi jibon khujte ebong beche thakte ake opore onno keu shathe dharonagulo odolbodol korte paren ebong apni ekoi obostha theke jontroghote bhogte paren.
